extendedInfo.description: Create and send your very own personal greeting cards, with our new self made greeting card application! In just a few clicks, you can design your custom card from scratch using stock drag and drop elements or by drawing your own. Upload your own photos and dress your creation up with cool special effects then share with others as email or on Facebook. With this app, you can choose from a myriad of beautiful designs or draw your own, all from your Android device. Itâs really easy and fun to use the appâs simple navigation, too. In just a few clicks, youâll have a card that you will be proud to email or Facebook to all your friends and family. Youâll start with a blank canvas and your imagination. Make the background any color you want, so itâll match the mood of your greeting perfectly. After that, just select the graphics or text you want and get creative. All you have to do is tap, drag and drop. Upload your own photos from gallery and make it very personal! Donât like some of the elements that youâve loaded onto the page? No problem, just delete them from the card and select new ones. See? Easy as pie. When it comes time to add the perfect sentiment to your card, thatâs a breeze, too. There are ready-to-go messages for you to choose from that you can customize.If that isnât custom enough for you, go ahead and type your own greeting and dress up your card to look exactly the way you want it. When youâre done, email it to friends and loved ones or share with others on Facebook. All it takes is a tap to the screen. Look at the features you get in DewDrops: â¢ Spectacularly cute, self-made greeting cards â¢ Upload your own photos from the Gallery * Hand draw functionality to draw text and imagesâ¢ Easy-to-use interface â¢ Tap, drag and drop stock graphics and text â¢ Set different canvas (background) colors â¢ Use predefined or custom text â¢ Apply special effects to dress up cards â¢ Share your cards with others via email or Facebook Release your inner artist and send those on your card list a thoughtful greeting that youâve created yourself. Download this application now

reviews.comment: Can\'t type, only draw. Can\'t select pre written text. Photo and clip art did not display when card was sent.back to the drawing board guys...
reviews.author: A Google User
